code: import React,{useEffect}from'react';import{useAuth}from'../context/AuthContext';import'./Profile.css';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const Profile=()=>{const{user,logout}=useAuth();useEffect(()=>{},[user]);if(!user){return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"profile-container",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"login-prompt",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h1",{children:"Access Denied"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("p",{children:"You need to log in to view your profile."}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("a",{href:"/login",className:"login-link",children:"Login"})]})});}return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"profile-container",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"profile-header",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("h1",{className:"profile-title",children:["Hello, ",user.username,"!"]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("p",{className:"profile-email",children:["Email: ",user.email]})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"profile-actions",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{className:"logout-button",onClick:logout,children:"Logout"})})]});};export default Profile;
